00053 MsqHessian::MsqHessian() :
00054   mEntries(0), mRowStart(0), mColIndex(0), 
00055   mSize(0), 
00056   mPreconditioner(0), precondArraySize(0),
00057   mR(0), mZ(0), mP(0), mW(0), cgArraySizes(0), maxCGiter(50)
00058 { }

00061 MsqHessian::~MsqHessian()
00062 {
00063   clear();
00064 }

00066 void MsqHessian::clear()
00067 {
00068   mSize = precondArraySize = cgArraySizes = 0;
00069 
00070   delete[] mEntries; mEntries = 0;
00071   delete[] mRowStart; mRowStart = 0;
00072   delete[] mColIndex; mColIndex = 0;
00073 
00074   delete[] mPreconditioner; mPreconditioner = 0;
00075 
00076   delete[] mR; mR = 0;
00077   delete[] mZ; mZ = 0;
00078   delete[] mP; mP = 0;
00079   delete[] mW; mW = 0;
00080 }

00086 void MsqHessian::initialize(PatchData &pd, MsqError &err)
00087 {
00088   MSQ_FUNCTION_TIMER( "MsqHession::initialize" );
00089   delete[] mEntries;
00090   delete[] mRowStart;
00091   delete[] mColIndex;
00092   
00093   size_t num_vertices = pd.num_free_vertices();
00094   size_t num_elements = pd.num_elements();
00095   size_t const * vtx_list;
00096   size_t e, r, rs, re, c, cs, ce, nz, nnz, nve, i, j;
00097   MsqMeshEntity* patchElemArray = pd.get_element_array(err); MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00098 
00099   if (num_vertices == 0) {
00100     MSQ_SETERR( err )( "No vertices in PatchData", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00101     return;
00102   }
00103 
00104   mSize = num_vertices;
00105 
00106   // Calculate the offsets for a CSC representation of the accumulation
00107   // pattern.
00108 
00109   size_t* col_start = new size_t[num_vertices + 1];
00110   //mAccumElemStart = new size_t[num_elements+1];
00111   //mAccumElemStart[0] = 0;
00112   
00113   for (i = 0; i < num_vertices; ++i) {
00114     col_start[i] = 0;
00115   }
00116 
00117   for (e = 0; e < num_elements; ++e) {
00118     nve = patchElemArray[e].node_count();
00119     vtx_list = patchElemArray[e].get_vertex_index_array();
00120     int nfe = 0;
00121     
00122     for (i = 0; i < nve; ++i) {
00123       r = vtx_list[i];
00124       if (r < num_vertices)
00125         ++nfe;
00126       
00127       for (j = i; j < nve; ++j) {
00128         c = vtx_list[j];
00129 
00130         if (r <= c) {
00131           if (c < num_vertices)
00132             ++col_start[c];
00133         }
00134         else {
00135           if (r < num_vertices)
00136             ++col_start[r];
00137         }
00138       }
00139     }
00140     //mAccumElemStart[e+1] = mAccumElemStart[e] + (nfe+1)*nfe/2;
00141   }
00142 
00143   nz = 0;
00144   for (i = 0; i < num_vertices; ++i) {
00145     j = col_start[i];
00146     col_start[i] = nz;
00147     nz += j;
00148   }
00149   col_start[i] = nz;
00150 
00151   // Finished putting matrix into CSC representation
00152 
00153   int* row_instr = new int[5*nz];
00154   size_t* row_index = new size_t[nz];
00155 
00156   nz = 0;
00157   for (e = 0; e < num_elements; ++e) {
00158     nve = patchElemArray[e].node_count();
00159     vtx_list = patchElemArray[e].get_vertex_index_array();
00160 
00161     for (i = 0; i < nve; ++i) {
00162       r = vtx_list[i];
00163 
00164       for (j = i; j < nve; ++j) {
00165         c = vtx_list[j];
00166 
00167         if (r <= c) {
00168           if (c < num_vertices) {
00169             row_index[col_start[c]] = r;
00170             row_instr[col_start[c]] = nz++;
00171             ++col_start[c];
00172           }
00173         }
00174         else {
00175           if (r < num_vertices) {
00176             row_index[col_start[r]] = c;
00177             //can't use -nz, but can negate row_instr[col_start[r]]
00178             row_instr[col_start[r]] = nz++;
00179             row_instr[col_start[r]] = -row_instr[col_start[r]];
00180             ++col_start[r];
00181           }
00182         }
00183       }
00184     }
00185   }
00186 
00187   for (i = num_vertices-1; i > 0; --i) {
00188     col_start[i+1] = col_start[i];
00189   }
00190   col_start[1] = col_start[0];
00191   col_start[0] = 0;
00192 
00193   //   cout << "col_start: ";
00194   //   for (int t=0; t<num_vertices+1; ++t)
00195   //     cout << col_start[t] << " ";
00196   //   cout << endl;
00197   //   cout << "row_index: ";
00198   //   for (int t=0; t<nz; ++t)
00199   //     cout << row_index[t] << " ";
00200   //   cout << endl;
00201   //   cout << "row_instr: ";
00202   //   for (int t=0; t<nz; ++t)
00203   //     cout << row_instr[t] << " ";
00204   //   cout << endl;
00205   
00206   
00207   // Convert CSC to CSR
00208   // First calculate the offsets in the row
00209 
00210   size_t* row_start = new size_t[num_vertices + 1];
00211     
00212   for (i = 0; i < num_vertices; ++i) {
00213     row_start[i] = 0;
00214   }
00215 
00216   for (i = 0; i < nz; ++i) {
00217     ++row_start[row_index[i]];
00218   }
00219 
00220   nz = 0;
00221   for (i = 0; i < num_vertices; ++i) {
00222     j = row_start[i];
00223     row_start[i] = nz;
00224     nz += j;
00225   }
00226   row_start[i] = nz;
00227     
00228   // Now calculate the pattern
00229 
00230   size_t* col_index = new size_t[nz];
00231   int* col_instr = new int[nz];
00232 
00233   for (i = 0; i < num_vertices; ++i) {
00234     cs = col_start[i];
00235     ce = col_start[i+1];
00236 
00237     while(cs < ce) {
00238       r = row_index[cs];
00239 
00240       col_index[row_start[r]] = i;
00241       col_instr[row_start[r]] = row_instr[cs];
00242 
00243       ++row_start[r];
00244       ++cs;
00245     }
00246   }
00247 
00248   for (i = num_vertices-1; i > 0; --i) {
00249     row_start[i+1] = row_start[i];
00250   }
00251   row_start[1] = row_start[0];
00252   row_start[0] = 0;
00253 
00254   delete[] row_index;
00255 
00256   // Now that the matrix is CSR
00257   // Column indices for each row are sorted
00258 
00259   // Compaction -- count the number of nonzeros
00260   mRowStart = col_start;   // don't need to reallocate
00261   //mAccumulation = row_instr;   // don't need to reallocate
00262   delete [] row_instr;
00263 
00264   for (i = 0; i <= num_vertices; ++i) {
00265     mRowStart[i] = 0;
00266   }
00267 
00268   nnz = 0;
00269   for (i = 0; i < num_vertices; ++i) {
00270     rs = row_start[i];
00271     re = row_start[i+1];
00272 
00273     c = num_vertices;
00274     while(rs < re) {
00275       if (c != col_index[rs]) {
00276         // This is an unseen nonzero
00277 
00278         c = col_index[rs];
00279         ++mRowStart[i];
00280         ++nnz;
00281       }
00282 
00283       //if (col_instr[rs] >= 0) {
00284       //  mAccumulation[col_instr[rs]] = nnz - 1;
00285       //}
00286       //else {
00287       //  mAccumulation[-col_instr[rs]] = 1 - nnz;
00288       //}
00289       
00290       ++rs;
00291     }
00292   }
00293 
00294   nnz = 0;
00295   for (i = 0; i < num_vertices; ++i) {
00296     j = mRowStart[i];
00297     mRowStart[i] = nnz;
00298     nnz += j;
00299   }
00300   mRowStart[i] = nnz;
00301 
00302   delete [] col_instr;
00303 
00304   // Fill in the compacted hessian matrix
00305 
00306   mColIndex = new size_t[nnz];
00307 
00308   for (i = 0; i < num_vertices; ++i) {
00309     rs = row_start[i];
00310     re = row_start[i+1];
00311 
00312     c = num_vertices;
00313     while(rs < re) {
00314       if (c != col_index[rs]) {
00315         // This is an unseen nonzero
00316 
00317         c = col_index[rs];
00318         mColIndex[mRowStart[i]] = c;
00319         mRowStart[i]++;
00320       }
00321       ++rs;
00322     }
00323   }
00324 
00325   for (i = num_vertices-1; i > 0; --i) {
00326     mRowStart[i+1] = mRowStart[i];
00327   }
00328   mRowStart[1] = mRowStart[0];
00329   mRowStart[0] = 0;
00330   
00331   delete [] row_start;
00332   delete [] col_index;
00333 
00334   mEntries = new Matrix3D[nnz]; // On Solaris, no initializer allowed for new of an array 
00335   for (i=0;i<nnz;++i) mEntries[i] = 0.; // so we initialize all entries manually. 
00336 
00337   //origin_pd = &pd;
00338 
00339   return;
00340 }
00341 
00342 void MsqHessian::initialize( const MsqHessian& other )
00343 {
00344   if (!other.mSize) 
00345   {
00346     delete[] mEntries;
00347     delete[] mRowStart;
00348     delete[] mColIndex;
00349     mEntries = 0;
00350     mRowStart = 0;
00351     mColIndex = 0;
00352     mSize = 0;
00353     return;
00354   }
00355     
00356   if (mSize != other.mSize || mRowStart[mSize] != other.mRowStart[mSize])
00357   {
00358     delete[] mEntries;
00359     delete[] mRowStart;
00360     delete[] mColIndex;
00361     
00362     mSize = other.mSize;
00363     
00364     mRowStart = new size_t[mSize + 1];
00365     mEntries = new Matrix3D[other.mRowStart[mSize]];
00366     mColIndex = new size_t[other.mRowStart[mSize]];
00367   }
00368     
00369   memcpy( mRowStart, other.mRowStart, sizeof(size_t)*(mSize+1) );
00370   memcpy( mColIndex, other.mColIndex, sizeof(size_t)*mRowStart[mSize] );
00371 }
00372 
00373 
00374 void MsqHessian::add( const MsqHessian& other )
00375 {
00376   assert( mSize == other.mSize );
00377   assert( !memcmp( mRowStart, other.mRowStart, sizeof(size_t)*(mSize+1) ) );
00378   assert( !memcmp( mColIndex, other.mColIndex, sizeof(size_t)*mRowStart[mSize] ) );
00379   for (unsigned i = 0; i < mRowStart[mSize]; ++i)
00380     mEntries[i] += other.mEntries[i];
00381 }

00383 
00385 void MsqHessian::get_diagonal_blocks(std::vector<Matrix3D> &diag,
00386                                      MsqError &/*err*/) const
00387 {
00388   // make sure we have enough memory, so that no reallocation is needed later.
00389   if (diag.size() != size()) {
00390     diag.reserve(size());
00391   }
00392 
00393   for (size_t i=0; i<size(); ++i) {
00394     diag[i] = mEntries[mRowStart[i]];
00395   }
00396 }

00398 
00402 void MsqHessian::compute_preconditioner(MsqError &/*err*/)
00403 {
00404   // reallocates arrays if size of the Hessian has changed too much.
00405   if (mSize > precondArraySize || mSize < precondArraySize/10 ) {
00406     delete[] mPreconditioner;
00407     mPreconditioner = new Matrix3D[mSize];
00408   }
00409 
00410   Matrix3D* diag_block;
00411   double sum, tmp;
00412   size_t m;
00413   // For each diagonal block, the (inverted) preconditioner is
00414   // the inverse of the sum of the diagonal entries.
00415   for (m=0; m<mSize; ++m) {
00416     diag_block = mEntries + mRowStart[m]; // Gets block at position m,m .
00417 
00418 #if !DIAGONAL_PRECONDITIONER
00419     // calculate LDL^T factorization of the diagonal block
00420     //  L = [1 pre[0][1] pre[0][2]]
00421     //      [0 1         pre[1][2]]
00422     //      [0 0         1        ]
00423     //  inv(D) = [pre[0][0] 0         0        ]
00424     //           [0         pre[1][1] 0        ]
00425     //           [0         0         pre[2][2]]
00426 
00427     //If the first method of calculating a preconditioner fails,
00428     // use the diagonal method.
00429     bool use_diag = false;
00430     
00431     if (fabs((*diag_block)[0][0]) < DBL_EPSILON) {
00432       use_diag = true;
00433     }
00434     else {
00435       mPreconditioner[m][0][0] = 1.0 / (*diag_block)[0][0];
00436       mPreconditioner[m][0][1] = (*diag_block)[0][1] *
00437           mPreconditioner[m][0][0];
00438       mPreconditioner[m][0][2] = (*diag_block)[0][2] *
00439           mPreconditioner[m][0][0];
00440       sum = ((*diag_block)[1][1] -
00441              (*diag_block)[0][1] * mPreconditioner[m][0][1]);
00442       if(fabs(sum)<=DBL_EPSILON)
00443         use_diag = true;
00444       else{
00445         mPreconditioner[m][1][1] = 1.0 / sum;
00446         
00447         tmp = (*diag_block)[1][2] - 
00448             (*diag_block)[0][2] * mPreconditioner[m][0][1];
00449 
00450         mPreconditioner[m][1][2] = mPreconditioner[m][1][1] * tmp;
00451 
00452         sum =  ((*diag_block)[2][2] - 
00453                 (*diag_block)[0][2]*mPreconditioner[m][0][2] - 
00454                 mPreconditioner[m][1][2]*tmp);
00455 
00456         if(fabs(sum)<= DBL_EPSILON)
00457           use_diag = true;
00458         else
00459           mPreconditioner[m][2][2] = 1.0 / sum;
00460       
00461       }
00462       
00463     }
00464     if(use_diag)
00465 #endif
00466     {    
00467         // Either this is a fixed vertex or the diagonal block is not
00468         // invertible.  Switch to the diagonal preconditioner in this
00469         // case.
00470 
00471       sum = (*diag_block)[0][0] + (*diag_block)[1][1] + (*diag_block)[2][2];
00472       if (fabs(sum) > DBL_EPSILON) 
00473         sum = 1 / sum;
00474       else
00475         sum = 0.0;
00476       
00477       mPreconditioner[m][0][0] = sum;
00478       mPreconditioner[m][0][1] = 0.0;
00479       mPreconditioner[m][0][2] = 0.0;
00480       mPreconditioner[m][1][1] = sum;
00481       mPreconditioner[m][1][2] = 0.0;
00482       mPreconditioner[m][2][2] = sum;
00483     }
00484   }
00485 }
00486 
00487 
00493 void MsqHessian::cg_solver(Vector3D x[], Vector3D b[], MsqError &err)
00494 {
00495   MSQ_FUNCTION_TIMER( "MsqHessian::cg_solver" );
00496   
00497   // reallocates arrays if size of the Hessian has changed too much.
00498   if (mSize > cgArraySizes || mSize < cgArraySizes/10 ) {
00499     delete[] mR;
00500     delete[] mZ;
00501     delete[] mP;
00502     delete[] mW;
00503     mR = new Vector3D[mSize];
00504     mZ = new Vector3D[mSize];
00505     mP = new Vector3D[mSize];
00506     mW = new Vector3D[mSize];
00507     cgArraySizes = mSize;
00508   }
00509 
00510   size_t i;
00511   double alpha_, alpha, beta; 
00512   double cg_tol = 1e-2; // 1e-2 will give a reasonably good solution (~1%). 
00513   double norm_g = length(b, mSize);
00514   double norm_r = norm_g;
00515   double rzm1; // r^T_{k-1} z_{k-1}
00516   double rzm2; // r^T_{k-2} z_{k-2}
00517 
00518   this->compute_preconditioner(err); MSQ_CHKERR(err); // get M^{-1} for diagonal blocks
00519 
00520   for (i=0; i<mSize; ++i)  x[i] = 0. ;  
00521   for (i=0; i<mSize; ++i)  mR[i] = -b[i] ;  // r = -b because x_0 = 0 and we solve H*x = -b
00522   norm_g *= cg_tol;
00523 
00524   this->apply_preconditioner(mZ, mR, err); // solve Mz = r (computes z = M^-1 r)
00525   for (i=0; i<mSize; ++i)  mP[i] = mZ[i] ; // p_1 = z_0  
00526   rzm1 = inner(mZ,mR,mSize); // inner product r_{k-1}^T z_{k-1} 
00527     
00528   size_t cg_iter = 0;
00529   while ((norm_r > norm_g) && (cg_iter < maxCGiter)) {
00530     ++cg_iter;
00531       
00532     axpy(mW, mSize, *this, mP, mSize, 0,0,err); // w = A * p_k
00533       
00534     alpha_ = inner(mP,mW,mSize); // alpha_ = p_k^T A p_k
00535     if (alpha_ <= 0.0) {
00536       if (1 == cg_iter) {
00537         for (i=0; i<mSize; ++i)  x[i] += mP[i]; // x_{k+1} = x_k + p_{k+1} 
00538       }
00539       break; // Newton goes on with this direction of negative curvature 
00540     }
00541 
00542     alpha = rzm1 / alpha_;
00543       
00544     for (i=0; i<mSize; ++i)  x[i] += alpha*mP[i]; // x_{k+1} = x_k + alpha_{k+1} p_{k+1} 
00545     for (i=0; i<mSize; ++i)  mR[i] -= alpha*mW[i]; // r_{k+1} = r_k - alpha_{k+1} A p_{k+1} 
00546     norm_r = length(mR, mSize);
00547  
00548     this->apply_preconditioner(mZ, mR, err); // solve Mz = r (computes z = M^-1 r)
00549       
00550     rzm2 = rzm1;
00551     rzm1 = inner(mZ,mR,mSize); // inner product r_{k-1}^T z_{k-1} 
00552     beta = rzm1 / rzm2;
00553     for (i=0; i<mSize; ++i)  mP[i] = mZ[i] + beta*mP[i]; // p_k = z_{k-1} + Beta_k * p_{k-1}
00554   }
00555 }
00556 
00557 void MsqHessian::product( Vector3D* v, const Vector3D* x ) const
00558 {
00559     // zero output array
00560   memset( v, 0, size() * sizeof(*v) );
00561   
00562     // for each row
00563   const Matrix3D* m_iter = mEntries;
00564   const size_t* c_iter = mColIndex;
00565   for (size_t r = 0; r < size(); ++r) {
00566     
00567       // diagonal entry
00568     plusEqAx( v[r], *m_iter, x[r] ); 
00569     ++m_iter; 
00570     ++c_iter;
00571     
00572       // off-diagonal entires
00573     for (size_t c = mRowStart[r] + 1; c != mRowStart[r+1]; ++c) {
00574       plusEqAx( v[r], *m_iter, x[*c_iter] );
00575       plusEqTransAx( v[*c_iter], *m_iter, x[r] );
00576       ++m_iter;
00577       ++c_iter;
00578     }
00579   }
00580 }
00581 
00582 /* ------------------ I/O ----------------- */
00583 
00585 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &s, const MsqHessian &h)
00586 {
00587   size_t i,j;
00588   s << "MsqHessian of size: " << h.mSize <<"x"<< h.mSize << "\n";
00589   for (i=0; i<h.mSize; ++i) {
00590     s << " ROW " << i << " ------------------------\n";
00591     for (j=h.mRowStart[i]; j<h.mRowStart[i+1]; ++j) {
00592       s << "   column " << h.mColIndex[j] << " ----\n";
00593       s << h.mEntries[j]; 
00594     } 
00595   }
00596   return s;
00597 }
